about.heroSubtitle: Transforming businesses with AI and cutting-edge technology since 2022.
about.AboutSubtitle: Pioneering IT solutions with a passion for innovation.
about.AboutText: Founded in 2022, GenicWave is a dynamic and innovative digital transformation and AI company dedicated to empowering industries worldwide to revolutionize their businesses. With a strong focus on cutting-edge artificial intelligence, we specialize in delivering intelligent, scalable, and future-ready solutions that drive efficiency, innovation, and growth.
about.missionText: To empower businesses globally by harnessing AI and transformative technology to drive growth, efficiency, and innovation.
about.visionText: To lead the world in delivering pioneering IT solutions, creating a future where technology seamlessly unlocks boundless opportunities for all.
about.teamSubtitle: Meet the innovators behind GenicWave’s success.

portfolio.heroSubtitle: Discover our innovative solutions and success stories through our latest projects and achievements.
portfolio.projectsSubtitle: Explore our latest work and achievements

projects.title: Survey Creation Platform (PicksieAI)
projects.description: A next-gen, scalable survey platform powered by AI effortlessly create surveys, collect responses, and automatically analyze results to truly understand your audience.

projects.title: Natural Language Data Analysis (NLDA)
projects.description: A powerful platform that connects to popular databases like PostgreSQL, MS SQL, and Snowflake etc. enabling anyone to perform data analysis using natural language. Get instant database responses with intelligent visualizations, no coding required.

projects.title: Application Tracking System (ATS)
projects.description: An intelligent Applicant Tracking System (ATS) that empowers HR teams to identify the best candidates within seconds streamlining recruitment with AI-driven precision and speed.

projects.title: MyMuster (Institute Management App ERP)
projects.description: Developed an application to digitize school and college operations streamlining daily tasks, roles, and management for Admins, Faculty, and Students with robust access control, significantly reducing manual effort.

projects.title: Genset Canopy (DesignMatix)
projects.description: Developed a SolidWorks-based tool that generates 3D models from user inputs, allowing users to import data from Excel sheets and export models in TXT, PDF, and Excel formats.

projects.title: Live Vehicle Tracking
projects.description: Developed a vehicle tracking app for admins and drivers, empowering admins to monitor drivers' live locations in real-time on Google Maps, ensuring efficient fleet management
